I think it's pretty well agreed that Pakistan is now AQ-HQ. There are little piddles of American/AQ-Taliban clashes in Afghanistan, but most of the folks that got away went to the friendly tribally controlled regions of Pakistan (o, and Bangladesh). Now, most of what goes on in Afghanistan is opium poppy and marijuana production, and grinding poverty (60% unemployment).
